verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> also <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H3427>dwellest<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H7200>see,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3808>not;<s%> they have <S%H241>ears<s%> to <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H3808>not:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

Therefore, <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H6213>prepare<s%> thee <S%H3627>stuff<s%> for <S%H1473>removing,<s%> and <S%H1540>remove<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight;<s%> and thou shalt <S%H1540>remove<s%> from thy <S%H4480>place<s%> <S%H4725><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight:<s%> it may <S%H194>be<s%> they will <S%H7200>consider,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> be a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

Then shalt thou bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> thy <S%H3627>stuff<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight,<s%> as <S%H3627>stuff<s%> for <S%H1473>removing:<s%> and <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt go <S%H3318>forth<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight,<s%> as they that go <S%H4161>forth<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity.<s%>
Dig <S%H2864><s%> thou through the <S%H7023>wall<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight,<s%> and carry <S%H3318>out<s%> thereby.

In their <S%H5869>sight<s%> shalt thou <S%H5375>bear<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H3802>shoulders,<s%> and carry it <S%H3318>forth<s%> in the <S%H5939>twilight:<s%> thou shalt <S%H3680>cover<s%> thy <S%H6440>face,<s%> that thou <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>ground:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> thee for a <S%H4159>sign<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And I <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> I was <S%H6680>commanded:<s%> I brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H3627>stuff<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> as <S%H3627>stuff<s%> for <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> and in the <S%H6153>even<s%> I <S%H2864>digged<s%> through the <S%H7023>wall<s%> with mine <S%H3027>hand;<s%> I brought it <S%H3318>forth<s%> in the <S%H5939>twilight,<s%> and I <S%H5375>bore<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> my <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight.<s%>
And in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H6213>doest<s%> <S%H859>thou?<s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> thou <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H4853>burden<s%> concerneth the <S%H5387>prince<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

Say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am your <S%H4159>sign:<s%> like <S%H834>as<s%> I have <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> unto them: they shall <S%H1473>remove<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity.<s%>

And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H8432>among<s%> them shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> his <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> in the <S%H5939>twilight,<s%> and shall go <S%H3318>forth:<s%> they shall <S%H2864>dig<s%> through the <S%H7023>wall<s%> to carry <S%H3318>out<s%> thereby: he shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> his <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H3282>that<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>ground<s%> with his <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

<S%H853><s%> My <S%H7568>net<s%> also will I <S%H6566>spread<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, and he shall be <S%H8610>taken<s%> in my <S%H4686>snare:<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> him to <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans;<s%> yet shall he <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> it, though he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And I will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> toward <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H5439>about<s%> him to <S%H5828>help<s%> him, and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H102>bands;<s%> and I will draw <S%H7324>out<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them.

And they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when I shall <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them in the <S%H776>countries.<s%>

But I will <S%H3498>leave<s%> a <S%H4557>few<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them from the <S%H4480>sword,<s%> <S%H2719><s%> from the <S%H4480>famine,<s%> <S%H7458><s%> and from the <S%H4480>pestilence;<s%> <S%H1698><s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> they may <S%H5608>declare<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they <S%H935>come;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> thy <S%H3899>bread<s%> with <S%H7494>quaking,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> thy <S%H4325>water<s%> with <S%H7269>trembling<s%> and with <S%H1674>carefulness;<s%>

And <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H413>of<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> They shall <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H3899>bread<s%> with <S%H1674>carefulness,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> their <S%H4325>water<s%> with <S%H8078>astonishment,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> her <S%H776>land<s%> may be <S%H3456>desolate<s%> from all that is <S%H4480>therein,<s%> <S%H4393><s%> because of the <S%H4480>violence<s%> <S%H2555><s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein.

And the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> shall be laid <S%H2717>waste,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8077>desolate;<s%> and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H2088>that<s%> <S%H4912>proverb<s%> that ye have <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H748>prolonged,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2377>vision<s%> <S%H6>faileth?<s%>

Tell <S%H559><s%> <S%H413><s%> them <S%H3651>therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> I will make <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4912>proverb<s%> <S%H853><s%> to <S%H7673>cease,<s%> and they shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> use it as a <S%H4911>proverb<s%> <S%H853><s%> in <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H1696>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, The <S%H3117>days<s%> are at <S%H7126>hand,<s%> and the <S%H1697>effect<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2377>vision.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H7723>vain<s%> <S%H2377>vision<s%> nor <S%H2509>flattering<s%> <S%H4738>divination<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> I will <S%H1696>speak,<s%> and the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> shall come to <S%H6213>pass;<s%> it shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H4900>prolonged:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> in your <S%H3117>days,<s%> O <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> will I <S%H1696>say<s%> the <S%H1697>word,<s%> and will <S%H6213>perform<s%> it, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H2377>vision<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H2372>seeth<s%> is for <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> to come, and <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H5012>prophesieth<s%> of the <S%H6256>times<s%> that are far <S%H7350>off.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> There shall <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of my <S%H1697>words<s%> be <S%H4900>prolonged<s%> any <S%H5750>more,<s%> but the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> shall be <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
